Sup! Everything up? My name is Gui lion! Have 25 years old when i typing this, i live in Sorocaba- Sp - Brazil ! In this moment, I studyng with no rest about Game Maker Language using Game Maker Studio 2. Passionate about metroidvanias and rogue-likes, I started programming using C# in Unity but today I use GMS2 for 2D or Godot (which loads 90% even my pc having 8 cores of 4.0ghz lol)

Send me a email to me!: [guilionleao@gmail.com](mailto:guilionleao@gmail.com)
